summary: Internal email from a paralegal specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY regarding the review and organization of photographic evidence (GX exhibits) exported from FBI systems for the US v. Epstein case. The email discusses tracking files, identifying sources, and technical issues viewing certain file types.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.context: Author of the email, working at the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY, compiling a spreadsheet of photos from FBI exports and coordinating review of evidence for the trial.

events.title: Evidence Review Coordination
events.description: Paralegal specialist emails about compiling and reviewing photographic evidence (GX exhibits) exported from the FBI for the US v. Epstein case, including tracking file information and addressing technical viewing issues.

locations: 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
Usa.doj.gov\cloud NYS StAndrews Shared USvEpstein-2018R01618\Trial\Paralega AUSA GX Photo Review Exports
keyFacts: Document is internal correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY regarding evidence for US v. Epstein.
Discusses photos pulled from FBI exports and compiled into a spreadsheet for tracking and source identification.
Notes technical issues viewing certain file types (.psd, .girl) from the FBI export.
References a shared drive location for trial materials related to the case (USvEpstein-2018R01618).
